thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 4 of 86
thread.title: Elijah Gainer
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Elijah Gainer

author: Elijah Gainer
title: Elijah Gainer
text: I had ordered Dior Sauvage, and it is absolutly amazing! The time and effort put into this fragrance is astonishing! Once i smelt it in a magazine I knew i needed to have it! Its metalic, woody/soapy essence is awesome! Dior also delivers your product with speed and fancy boxes that add to the care they put into making their customers happy! They also give you so many more sampler items in a package! I can honestly say, am always going to love dior pruducts because they always deliver amazing products!
